availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carriage maker. Charlestown, Maryland, native. Married to Emeline Terrell Severson. Father of Jennie T. Severson Sparks. Carriage maker in Louisville, Kentucky, from c1848 to 1889. Owner of Enders and Severson Carriage Manufacturers in partnership with Joseph Enders in Louisville until 1889.

ab.bibl:
"Stephen Severson Dead," Louisville Courier-Journal, March 10, 1895.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 3, p. 289A.
